title: optgroup
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <optgroup> tag defines a group of related options in a select dropdown list.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Create a dropdown list with two groups of options
usageExamples.code:
<select>
  <optgroup label='Group 1'>
    <option value='1'>Option 1.1</option>
    <option value='2'>Option 1.2</option>
  </optgroup>
  <optgroup label='Group 2'>
    <option value='3'>Option 2.1</option>
    <option value='4'>Option 2.2</option>
  </optgroup>
</select>
